casebody.data:
Certiorari Granted. (See also Nos. 89, 108 and 199, supra.)

No. 60. Krug v. Sheridan-Wyoming Coal Co., Inc. Solicitor General Perlman for petitioner. T. Peter Ansberry, Stephen J. McMahon, Jr. and Seth W. Richardson for respondent.

United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit. Certiorari granted.
